app_descript:
Rescue Cut

Brief: Dive into a world of critical thinking and quick action with Rescue Cut. A puzzling scenario unfolds with each level, where you must slice through various ropes to free a captive character. Will you be able to navigate through the treacherous obstacles and guide them to safety? The fate of these characters rests in your hands - it's time to slice smartly and save the day!
